String.Source: Controls whether the FX chances are treates as percentages Default: Disabled
String.Dest: Controls whether the FX chances are treates as percentages Default: Disabled

String.Source: Enables or disables the cloak spell on the player that applies the FX spell to NPCs Disable before brawls to avoid the brawl bug Default: Enabled
String.Dest: Enables or disables the cloak spell on the player that applies the FX spell to NPCs Disable before brawls to avoid the brawl bug Default: Enabled

String.Source: Controls whether the FX remain on killed summons Default: Enabled
String.Dest: Controls whether the FX remain on killed summons Default: Enabled

String.Source: The time after initial reanimation that the FX will degrade further; Does not apply to undead who don't disintegrate on death (e.g. thralls) Set to 0 to disable; Default: 40
String.Dest: The time after initial reanimation that the FX will degrade further; Does not apply to undead who don't disintegrate on death (e.g. thralls) Set to 0 to disable; Default: 40

String.Source: The time from one degredation to the next, after dynamic degredation has started Set to 0 to disable; Default: 1
String.Dest: The time from one degredation to the next, after dynamic degredation has started Set to 0 to disable; Default: 1

String.Source: The time after initial reanimation that the FX will degrade further; Does not apply to undead who don't disintegrate on death (e.g. thralls) Set to 0 to disable; Default: 30
String.Dest: The time after initial reanimation that the FX will degrade further; Does not apply to undead who don't disintegrate on death (e.g. thralls) Set to 0 to disable; Default: 30

String.Dest: The time from one degredation to the next, after dynamic degredation has started Set to 0 to disable; Default: 10

String.Source: Enables or disables the reapplication of the effect shader when changing cells; useful for people running 'Wet and Cold' or other mods that may apply other FX Default: Disabled
String.Dest: Enables or disables the reapplication of the effect shader when changing cells; useful for people running 'Wet and Cold' or other mods that may apply other FX Default: Disabled

String.Source: Adds an unenchantable amulet with the FX spell to the player It is called the "Necromantic Amulet"
String.Dest: Adds an unenchantable amulet with the FX spell to the player It is called the "Necromantic Amulet"

String.Source: Adds an amulet which cleans the FX off anyone who equips it It is called the "Repentant Amulet"
String.Dest: Adds an amulet which cleans the FX off anyone who equips it It is called the "Repentant Amulet"

String.Source: Adds meat underneath the dissolved skin; this is WIP: the model hasn't been fitted for females, doesn't adjust its size with the NPC's weight, and doesn't look that great Default: Disabled
String.Dest: Adds meat underneath the dissolved skin; this is WIP: the model hasn't been fitted for females, doesn't adjust its size with the NPC's weight, and doesn't look that great Default: Disabled
